mapper.insert: insert into media_entity ( folder, name, status, mdate, content_type, put_content_type, content_length) values ( #{folder}, #{name}, #{status}, now(), #{content_type}, #{put_content_type}, #{content_length})
mapper.update: update media_entity set content_type = #{content_type}, content_length = #{content_length}, mdate = now() where id = #{id}
update media_entity e set e.folder = #{new_prefix} || substring(e.folder, #{prefix_like_len}), e.mdate = now() where e.folder like #{prefix_like}
mapper.delete: delete from media_entity e where e.folder like #{prefix_like}
mapper.select: select e.* from media_entity as e where e.folder = #{folder} order by e.status desc, e.name asc

select e.id as "id", e.name as "name", e.status as "status", e.content_type as "content_type", e.content_length as "content_length", e.folder as "folder" from media_entity e where e.folder = #{folder} and e.name = #{name}
